languages.text: "Кассия — почетный гость на корабле, и команде должно смириться со всеми ее странностями и капризами. А тем, кто не сможет, — выдайте плетей!"

traits.locale_text: "Кассия — почетный гость на корабле, и команде должно смириться со всеми ее странностями и капризами. А тем, кто не сможет, — выдайте сотню плетей!"

languages.text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"
languages.original_text: "Кассия — почетный гость на корабле, и команде должно смириться со всеми ее странностями и капризами. А тем, кто не сможет, — выдайте плетей!"

traits.locale_text: "Cassia is an honorable guest on this voidship, and the crew must come to terms with all her oddities and whims. As for those who cannot — a hundred lashes each of them!"
"Cassia is an honorable guest on this voidship, and the crew must come to terms with all her oddities and whims. As for those who cannot — a hundred lashes each of them!"
"Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"
"Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"
"Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

languages.text: “卡西娅是这艘船上尊贵的客人，所有船员都必须想办法接受她的怪癖与任性。如果有谁做不到的话，就赏他们一顿鞭子吧！”
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅是这艘船上尊贵的客人，所有船员都必须想办法接受她的怪癖与任性。如果有谁做不到的话，就赏他们一顿鞭子吧！”

languages.text: «Cassia es una honorable huésped en esta nave, y los tripulantes deben aceptar sus peculiaridades y caprichos. ¡Y los que no puedan recibirán latigazos!».
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

traits.locale_text: «Cassia es una honorable huésped en esta nave, y los tripulantes deben aceptar sus peculiaridades y caprichos. ¡Y los que no puedan recibirán latigazos!».

languages.text: "Cassia ist ein Ehrengast auf diesem Raumschiff und die Raumfahrer müssen sich mit allen ihren Launen und Seltsamkeiten arrangieren. Und alle, die das nicht können ... werden ausnahmslos ausgepeitscht!"
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

traits.locale_text: "Cassia ist ein Ehrengast auf diesem Raumschiff und die Raumfahrer müssen sich mit allen ihren Launen und Seltsamkeiten arrangieren. Und alle, die das nicht können ... werden ausnahmslos ausgepeitscht!"

languages.text: « Cassia est une invitée de marque à bord de ce vaisseau spatial, et les cosmomarins doivent s'accommoder de ses bizarreries et de ses caprices. Faites fouetter tous ceux qui n'en montreront incapables ! »
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

traits.locale_text: « Cassia est une invitée de marque à bord de ce vaisseau spatial, et les cosmomarins doivent s'accommoder de ses bizarreries et de ses caprices. Faites fouetter tous ceux qui n'en montreront incapables ! »

languages.text: 「カシアは、このヴォイドシップの栄誉ある客人だ。ヴォイズマン達は、彼女の変わってるところも、マイペースなところも、全て受け入れるべきだろう。それができないと言う者は…ひとり残らず鞭打ちの刑だ！」
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"

traits.locale_text: 「カシアは、このヴォイドシップの栄誉ある客人だ。ヴォイズマン達は、彼女の変わってるところも、マイペースなところも、全て受け入れるべきだろう。それができないと言う者は…ひとり残らず鞭打ちの刑だ！」

languages.text: "Cassia, bu geminin onur konuğudur. Uçsuz erleri kendisinin tuhaflıklarına ve kaprislerine alışacak. Alışmayanlara da kırbaç vurulacak!"
languages.original_text: "Cassia is an honoured guest on this voidship, and the voidsmen must come to terms with all her oddities and caprices. And for those who cannot — lashes to every one of them!"
